name: Kecleon
author: OOYAMA
flavor_text: It changes its shading to match its surroundings so it can sneak up on prey. Only its belly patterns stay fixed.

abilities.name: Unit Color 1
abilities.effect: As long as this Pokémon has Unit Energy {G}{R}{W} attached to it, it is a {G}, {R}, and {W} Pokémon.

attacks.name: Tongue Smack
attacks.effect: If your opponent’s Active Pokémon is an Evolution Pokémon, this attack does 50 more damage.
